title: To-do item
description: Schema for stored todo items, based on the typicode REST API

userId.title: user id
userId.description: The unique identifier for the user who owns the to-do item

id.title: todo item id
id.description: The unique identifier for the to-do item

title.title: todo item text
title.description: A free-text description of the to-do item
examples: excepturi a et neque qui expedita vel voluptate

completed.title: is the todo item completed
completed.description: True if the to-do item has been completed, false if it is still pending

examples.title: cupiditate necessitatibus ullam aut quis dolor voluptate
excepturi a et neque qui expedita vel voluptate
